Carrier.2008.3of10.Super.Secrets.HDTV.XviD

CARRIER is a character driven, edge-of-your-seat, nonfiction drama as well as a total immersion in the high stakes world of a nuclear aircraft carrier. CARRIER follows a core group of film participants aboard the USS Nimitz, from the admiral of the strike group to the fighter pilots to the youngest sailors, as they navigate personal conflicts around their jobs, families, faith, patriotism, love, the rites of passage and the war on terror.

Executive Producer: Mel Gibson

Episode Three: Super Secrets

Many aspects of life on a nuclear aircraft carrier are hush-hush, including the ship&#039;s location, itinerary, details of how a nuclear reactor works - and on-board dating. Dating and sex aboard ship are strictly forbidden, but according to one sailor, with 5,000 people on board, relationships are "inevitable," resulting in a "don&#039;t ask, don&#039;t tell" policy that applies to relationships as well as sexual orientation.
